text: Microsoft Teams is a business communication platform developed by Microsoft. It includes a video chat software. It has gained popularity in the COVID-19 pandemic. == Languages == Microsoft Teams is available in the following languages: Language Local name Dialect(s) Albanian Shqip Arabic Saudi Arabian Azerbaijani Basque Euskara Bulgarian Catalan Català Catalan (Catalonia) and Valencian Chinese Chinese (China), Hong Kong (Cantonese), Macau (Cantonese), Singaporean and Taiwanese (Traditional) Croatian Hrvatski Czech Čeština Danish Dansk Dutch Nederlands Dutch (Netherlands) and Flemish English English American, Australian, Belizean, British, Canadian, Caribbean, Filipino, Indian, Irish, Jamaican, Malaysian, New Zealand, Singaporean, South African, Trinidad and Tobago and Zimbabwean Estonian Eesti Finnish Suomi French Français Belgian, French (France), Luxembourg, Monaco, Québec and Swiss Galician Galego Georgian German Deutsch Austrian, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg and Swiss Greek Ελληνίκά Hebrew Hindi Hungarian Magyar Icelandic Íslenska Indonesian Bahasa Indonesia Italian Italiano Italian (Italy) and Swiss Japanese Kazakh Korean South Korean Latvian Latviešu Lithuanian Lietuvių Macedonian Norwegian Bokmål Norsk Bokmål Norwegian Nynorsk Norsk Nynorsk Polish Polski Portuguese Portugěs Brazilian and Portuguese (Portugal) Romanian Română Russian русский Serbian Srpski Slovak Slovenian Slovenščina Spanish Español American, various Latin American dialects, Mexican and Spanish (Spain) Swedish Svenska Finland Swedish and Swedish (Sweden) Thai Turkish Türkçe Ukrainian Vietnamese Tiếng Việt Welsh Cymraeg Category:Microsoft Windows software Category:Messaging Category:Video chat
title: Microsoft Teams
